Package it.polimi.ingsw

Class Deckgrid

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Deckgrid
public class Deckgrid
extends java.lang.Object
It's the grid of DevelopmentCards, organized by level and color.

      public Deckgrid() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

      java.io.FileNotFoundException - check if the card is in the .json
